alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Porte County through 330 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorm near La Porte, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trail Creek and Westville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 53. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan near mile marker 0. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte
